column2: depression_fam <- depression %>% group_by(Gender, Family.History.of.Mental.Illness, Depression) %>% summarise(count=n())
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'Gender', 'Family.History.of.Mental.Illness'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
ggplot(depression_fam, aes(x = Family.History.of.Mental.Illness, y = count, fill = Gender)) +
title = "Does a Students have a Family History of Mental Illness? and Whether or not they are Depressed",
